distractor_protocol.step: Common misconceptions: Confuse public/private roles (e.g., 'public key decrypts').
Command errors: Wrong flags (e.g., ssh-keygen -t rsa instead of ed25519).
RFC inaccuracies: Wrong RFC numbers (e.g., RFC 4251 as Transport Layer).
Security pitfalls: Incorrect permissions (e.g., 644 on private key), no passphrase.
Plausible alternatives: Similar commands/tools (e.g., scp vs ssh-copy-id).
